title: Economics
content: I'm mostly interested by how we can create more fair company structures, like cooperatives.

title: Home
content: Hey Iâ€™m Thibaud! Welcome to my garden. It's fairly new, so there's still much to do. I like to make video games, talk about Economics, Ecology and Technology. You can also take a look at my Reading Notes, they can be about something I've read, but also watched, played or listen to.

title: Garden Todo
content:
Most of my notes are not yet available, there is still a lot of seeds to sow.
There's also a lot of changes to be made to the site itself:
